# `{sarcasm}`

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
```


Produces sArCaStic text from a character vector.

```{r}
set.seed(2)
text = 'pythonistas'
sarcasm(text)
```

```{r}
set.seed(2)
text = c('pythonistas', 'r_users')
sarcasm(text)
```

Comes with shorthand as well.

```{r}
text %>% `/s`
```
